title: The most important interpretations of baldness in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Baldness in a dream: Seeing someone in a dream that he is bald and has lost his hair, which gives him an aesthetic appearance that satisfies himself and makes him feel satisfied with his appearance, is one of the things that carries bad meanings that one interprets because of the meanings. With the death of the blessing or the passing of a period of crisis. Baldness in a dream The dream interpretation of baldness in his dream expresses bankruptcy of all kinds, whether it is material bankruptcy such as money and wealth, or the bankruptcy of ideas and the ability to invent new ways to deal with the life situations they are going through. What he sees is against him. The duration of this dream, in the interpretation, is a sign that he is going through financial hardship or losing large sums of money in his business, because it symbolizes the soon death of the blessing that the dreamer enjoys. It is also said that seeing baldness in a dream is a sign of ignorance and lack of sufficient knowledge, especially in religious matters. Because the interpretation expresses that the dreamer does not have knowledge that will benefit him or make him appear wise in front of others. . Others. Baldness in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin states in interpreting the vision of others that baldness in a dream symbolizes the crises and problems that the dreamer is exposed to in his field of work, which reduces the means of livelihood he obtains or changes the conditions of his livelihood. . Worse still, this vision is evidence of exposure to health ailments or serious diseases, and for the dreamer in the period following this dream, the interpretation is a message to him that he should be patient with the suffering. According to another interpretation, dreaming of baldness in a dream indicates exposure to injustice and weakness of the dreamer, as He cannot compensate for the injustice to himself or restore his rights, but the interpretation may express relief and resemblance. Support others for him. The specialized online dream interpretation site features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet on Google. Baldness in a dream for a single woman, because baldness for an unmarried girl in a dream is a sign of fear and extreme anxiety that this girl feels about her beauty and appearance that others see, so in a dream it is a sign of self-love and fear of evil, As in the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a bald man in her dream, but she did not see him. Before in her real life, the reference to the desire of an unsuitable man to marry or marry her, in the interpretation it is a signal to her that he will not be a suitable husband. Losing an unmarried girl’s hair to the point of baldness in a dream is considered a sign of the imminent loss of loved ones from her family, In most interpretations, it is a sign of the approaching guardianship of a guardian. Baldness in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: Baldness during a dream indicates separation or many problems and crises between her and her husband, as baldness expresses instability and reassurance in life and marital life, and the interpretation of the dream also symbolizes Dream - Married woman: A constant feeling of sadness and dissatisfaction with life as she lives with her husband financially or psychologically. It is advisable for a married woman to see that the hair of one of her children is falling out in a dream.

title: I dreamed that I married my husband and I was happy

preview.html: I dreamed that I got married to my husband and happily through one of the sites. The vision of the site roy2a.com Marriage is the sacred bond and the year of life on earth through meeting a man and a woman who have a lot of compatibility and spiritual and social understanding, and this is what marriage is based on in most societies, and today in this article we will satisfy the most important Interpretations that came from great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen and others around the world. Seeing marriage to the same husband in a woman’s dream. Follow us. I dreamed that I married my husband and I was happy. The dream of marriage in general is considered a sign of achieving desired goals, fulfilling wishes, and hearing good news. Seeing a woman A married woman marrying the same husband in a dream indicates the renewal of their relationship and the collapse of disputes and problems between them. Seeing a woman marrying her husband in a dream indicates that the news of pregnancy will be announced soon. I dreamed that I married my husband and I was happy. The vision shows the changes that are occurring in this woman’s life for the better. To see marriage once again Another in a married woman’s dream is considered a good vision that bodes well and food will come to her or her husband and children. Wearing a white dress in a married woman’s dream refers to happy events in her life, such as a promotion or the end of her problems. Seeing marriage again in a dream that he is married to a strong man indicates that she has achieved Her ambitions for the future. I dreamed that I married my husband and I am happy to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing marriage again in a dream. From the same person to a married woman, there is good news that blessings and goodness will come in her life and she will regain happiness. The dream of marrying another person in a married woman’s dreamHe was a good man Appearance, a sign of Sarah’s entry into her life later. Marrying a stranger in a married woman’s dream refers to the sad news she hears or some problems. Seeing marriage to a dead person in a married woman’s dream means worries and problems in her life or hearing bad news. I dreamed that I married my dead husband. Seeing a woman getting married Her dead husband in a dream indicates the stability and righteousness that she will experience in the coming period. A married woman dreamed that her dead husband was smiling at her in a dream, indicating the arrival of food, goodness, comfort and contentment in her life in the coming period. My dead husband’s smile in a dream indicates the bliss that this dead person feels because of the reward. And the zakat that he receives from his family and friends. I dreamed that I married my wife again. Seeing a man marrying his wife again in a dream indicates the income and livelihood that he will obtain in the near future, whether from his work, trade, or personal level. Seeing a man marrying the same wife in a married man’s dream indicates detailing problems. And the disagreements between them. The vision of the wedding again shows a dream of a married man. There is news about the pregnancy that he will soon have with his wife. We are happy to show you the reception location of your dreams. I dreamed that I married my husband and I was happy. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a nephew in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the nephew in a dream As seeing the nephew in a dream is one of the visions that many people have in their dreams, and it is one of the dreams that indicate many meanings, but the interpretation differs according to the state of the dreamer in the dream, and this is what we will refer you to in this article for advanced interpretation scholars. Read more: Toilet in a dream Meaning of seeing the nephew in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of the nephew in a dream Imam Ibn Sirin sees seeing the nephew in a dream with many connotations as follows. An unmarried aunt dreams of a smiling nephew in a dream with goodness and happiness. In a dream, the nephew of a married woman indicates an upcoming pregnancy. The dream of the nephew in a pregnant woman's dream also indicates an easy birth. The nephew enters the house in good condition and carries some gifts and sees him happy, and this indicates the arrival of kindness from his nephew. This dream may also indicate the nephew's association with one of his cousins. Read more: Pregnancy in a dream Meaning of the nephew in a dream Dreaming of the nephew in a dream indicates many different meanings, as we will tell you. Seeing a child in a dream is one of the best dreams that comes to mind The dreamer, but if he saw him smiling in a dream, he was wearing clean clothes. And this vision is also a bad dream, if the child wore unclean clothes or saw him angry and sad. The nephew in the uncle's dream The dream of the nephew in the uncle's dream indicates the following meanings. This vision is a reflection of reality, which is the good relationship between the nephew and the uncle. The dream of the nephew in a dream indicates new changes for the fortuneteller in the coming days. This vision also shows marriage to an unmarried uncle. Read more: Penguin in a dream The nephew in a pregnant woman's dream The dream of the nephew in a dream indicates good and good news for her. Seeing the pregnant nephew indicates an easy birth for her. It also indicates the birth of a pregnant boy, especially if the child is beautiful in the dream. This vision is considered a message of reassurance. Interpretation of the nephew in a dream The vision of the nephew indicates many clues, as interpreted by jurists in the interpretation of dreams. Seeing the nephew in a dream when he is young is more beautiful than seeing him when he is old, but he must appear smiling and handsome. Most of the appearance of the girl in her aunt's dream is considered a worthy vision Praising her, provided that she appears beautiful, clean and happy. But to see a bad, dirty and impure child, or to see him angry, this is a bad dream for the fortune teller. The name of the nephew in a dream has many meanings, the best of which are the names of the servant and praise for the seer. The nephew can also appear in a dream with a name different from his real name, and this is evidence of the recovery of the patient or the journey or the success of the fortune teller. The dream of an unmarried aunt in a dream about her nephew shows the good and benefit that accrues to her when she sees her nephew looking good. One of the best dreams of a nephew is to look like a beautiful child and not be sad. And the dream of a married woman who has not given birth shows that she is carrying her nephew, and this indicates that the dreamer is pregnant. Read more: Washing the dead I saw a nephew

title: Interpretation of seeing a shelf in a dream

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribersFans Interpretation of seeing a shelf in a dream through the Shamloul website. A shelf is a form of furniture designed to organize things. It can be for organizing books, clothes, or anything else, and it can be used for decoration and adding a modern and aesthetic touch. Touching the house and seeing a shelf in a dream has many interpretations that differ, whether it is tidy or not and whether it is full or empty, and in this article we will show you in detail the interpretation of seeing a folder in a dream in detail. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing shelves. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing a shelf in a dream is evidence of concealing secrets and concealing defects. Seeing a shelf can be a sign of a worthy wife. Whoever sees in a dream a shelf full of funny things and collectibles states that God will give birth to a male and appreciates the arts and may be evidence of a protective woman who keeps secrets. Seeing a shelf is evidence of the presence of a business partner that benefits the owner. It can That the shelf is a sign of safety and security. Interpretation of seeing a shelf in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is cleaning a shelf, this indicates a good life and positive events in his field of work and may indicate that he is an organized and meticulous person. Seeing cleaning a shelf can be a sign of great profit, and evidence On his success in his field of work, and he will achieve many successes and raise his status in the workplace. Interpretation of seeing a shelf arranged in a dream: Arranging a shelf in a dream could be an attempt to correct the mistakes of some parents or husbands, in addition to the damage, problems, and fears that he brought back. Seeing a shelf arranged in a dream Evidence that the dreamer is a person who helps people with their problems. Interpretation of seeing a shelf in a dream: Empty a shelf is evidence of great financial gains and success in the field of work. There are those who interpreted seeing a shelf in a dream as a sign of getting rid of problems and having a calm and happy life. It can be Scanning the shelf is evidence that the fortuneteller is a healthy and energetic person. Seeing the scanning shelf could be a sign that the partnership he will enter into will bring him good and prosperity. Seeing an empty shelf in a dream Seeing an empty shelf in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will go through a phase in his life Full of problems and difficulties in his professional life. This may be evidence of a disappointment he experienced in his life that spoils his relationship with the people around him. It could be a sign of sadness for trivial reasons. Seeing a white shelf in a dream A white shelf is evidence of good and blessed work that will benefit him and it may be a sign of success. In his professional life. Therefore, we offer you all possible interpretations of knowing the circumstances in a dream. For anyone who has a vision and wants to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of seeing a white dress in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing white clothes in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision of the roy2a.com website that seeing wearing white dresses in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that indicates a peaceful married life and family stability, so we will talk about the interpretation This vision through this article is for single people, married people, pregnant women, married couples, single young men, and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing a single girl wearing a white dress in a dream? Seeing a single girl wearing a white dress in a dream indicates extreme religiosity. God will cover her and her marriage will approach. Seeing a single girl wearing a white dress in a dream indicates extreme religiosity. God will cover her and her marriage will approach. A wedding dress in a dream is a sign of the failure of her romantic relationship and her separation from her fiancé. Seeing a single woman in a white dress in a dream is one of the promising visions that symbolize the coming of goodness for her and her family. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person wearing a wedding dress in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman wearing a white dress in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a white dress in a dream indicates the end of pregnancy and labor problems. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing a white dress in a dream is a sign that she will give birth soon and will provide her with a healthy fetus, whether it is a boy or a girl. What is the interpretation of seeing a lost dress in a dream? Seeing a loss A dress in a dream is a sign of the approach of the Gulf and the disappearance of worry and sadness. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream searching for a lost dress is an indication of her distracted thinking about many difficult things to solve. Seeing yourself wearing a dirty dress in a dream is an indication of many worries and worries due to many disputes and marital problems. See also Interpretation of seeing the details of a dress in a dream: What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin seeing himself in a dream in a white dress? Seeing her wearing a white dress in Ibn Sirin’s dream indicates that it brings joy and happiness to the dreamer. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a long white dress in a dream is an example of the strength of her relationship with her fiancé and her intense love for him. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a white dress in a dream? Seeing a married woman wearing a white dress in a dream carries many meanings and interpretations. A short dress indicates her negligence in household affairs and her neglect of her husband and children. Seeing a married woman wearing a long dress covering the entire body is a sign of good behavior among people. And his purity and wisdom. Dreaming of wearing a long white dress denotes a feeling of security and joy. The blue dress denotes goodness and plenty of nourishment. The red dress symbolizes her nourishment with a happy pregnancy. The black dress symbolizes great harm and anxiety. See also: Interpretation of seeing my friend wearing a white wedding dress in... What is the interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a wedding dress in a dream? Seeing yourself wearing a wedding dress in a dream is a good vision that indicates joy and joy, such as the approaching marriage or success in one of the big jobs from which he makes a lot of profit and from which his future is secure. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person vomiting in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dead person vomiting in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing the dead person vomiting in a person’s dream indicates the collapse of disputes and problems for the fortuneteller. It is also believed that a person sees the piety of the dead person in a person’s dream, so if the vomiting is blood, this indicates the death of the dreamer and the serious illness that afflicted him. Also, seeing the dead person vomiting in a dream appears to an unmarried woman if she is her fiancé or lover, and this indicates the end of her troubles and the end of the approaching marriage. Interpretation of seeing the dead person vomiting in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that her dead father is vomiting, this means that she will marry the man who She loves him, and God knows best. Also, seeing someone vomiting blood in her dream indicates her success and distinction in her studies and in all aspects of her life. Also, seeing one of her relatives vomiting while she is dead in her dream indicates her good condition and her commitment to work. Seeing a dead person vomiting blood in a girl’s dream Unmarried indicates his serious illness and sudden death. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased father vomiting in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing indigo in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the color indigo in a dream. Interpretation of a vision. The color indigo in a dream is considered one of the positive colors that indicate optimism and getting rid of pessimism. Seeing the color indigo in a dream is one of the visions that indicate the dreamer’s closeness to his Lord, the strength of his faith and good intentions in religion. Also, seeing the color indigo in a dream means That the dreamer will live a period full of calm, stability, and freedom from haters. Also, seeing someone wearing an indigo dress is one of those people who have a dreamy personality and strive to achieve success. Interpretation of the color of indigo in a dream for a single woman When a girl sees this color in her dream, it means that she is an ambitious person He loves life, progress, and the pursuit of success. The interpretation of seeing the color indigo in a dream is evidence that her next life will be free of problems and worries, and anxiety will be free from her. Also, evidence of this dream in the dreams of single women shows a calm and beautiful personality and shows love in people’s souls. Seeing the color Indigo in a single woman’s dream is one of the dreams that she seeks, which indicates that she will get married soon and find a good and suitable husband. Interpretation of the color of indigo in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing a married woman wearing indigo clothes in a dream is a sign that she feels a constant desire to make her husband and children happy. Seeing A married woman wearing an indigo dress in a dream indicates a beautiful reality and a stable and romantic life living with her husband. The color indigo in a woman’s dream is considered one of the dreams that show her the abundance of money, kindness, and livelihood that she will obtain in her next life. Interpretation of the color of indigo in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees Herself in a dream wearing an indigo dress is one of the visions that indicate good conditions, stability, and better health. Likewise, when a woman sees the color indigo in a dream, one of the dreams that indicate to a pregnant woman is that she will be blessed with a child who will be female, and God knows what is in the wombs. The color of indigo in A woman’s dream indicates goodness and benevolence, and that God will grant her a peaceful birth without problems and disturbances. The interpretation of a dream about sleeping on a pillow of this color is one of the good dreams and indicates that you will move to a new life that is better than it was before. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of the color green in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the color green in a dream for a married woman, according to the Nabulsi interpreter. The Nabulsi interpreter will interpret seeing the color green in a dream for a married woman as a sign that she is married to a man who respects morals and generosity. The appearance of the color green in a dream is evidence that this year the dreamer will obtain sufficient sustenance and many good things. The year, God willing. But if a married woman suffers from some health diseases and sees the color green in a dream, then this dream indicates that she will get rid of those diseases and recover from them soon, God willing. And do not forget to read our article about: The color green in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of the color green. In a dream of a married woman by Imam Al-Sadiq, Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing the color green in a married woman’s dream as an indication that her life is characterized by stability in all emotional, social, and financial aspects. Also, if a married woman sees the color green, and that woman is pregnant, then this vision bodes well for her. For her, she will give birth to a healthy, healthy child who will be born safely, God willing. Seeing the color green in a dream is also interpreted to mean that the vision will move to a new stage in her life, and this stage will be a good stage for her. Whereas if the woman is facing problems or pressures in her life and she sees the color green in a dream, This bodes well and indicates that she will get rid of these problems and be psychologically free from pressure. Interpretation of the color green in a dream for a married woman. Al-Asidi interprets the green color in a dream for a married woman as an indication that she will be able to achieve the dreams she seeks, especially those she wanted to achieve during the period Previous. Also, if a married woman sees in a dream that she is sitting in a place surrounded by green plants on all sides. This indicates that there will be radical changes in her life. Also be positive, as these changes are like buying a new house. But if the married woman is a worker and sees the color green In her dream. This is a good omen for her that she will get rid of the enemies of the project. The problems that she will face during this time will be solved and you will have a quiet time. Interpretation of the color green in a dream for a married woman according to the translator Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interprets the dream of a married woman as seeing her children wearing green clothes in her dream. In a dream, this bodes well for her that they will advance in their studies. Also, if a married woman suffers from delayed childbearing and sees that the mattress on which she sits or sleeps is green, then this is a good omen for her. God willing, God will carry her soon. But if the married woman commits forbidden sins and mistakes And she saw the green color in the dream. This is a sign for her that she will truly repent and therefore she must begin to return to God Almighty. And she repented from her heart with irrevocable repentance that brings her closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of the green color in a dream for a married woman according to the interpreter Ibn Sirin. The interpreter Muhammad considers Ibn Sirin is one of the leading translators in the field of dreams and visions, and many people prefer to receive him

title: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning teeth for an unmarried and divorced woman

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about brushing your teeth in a dream. Seeing yourself brushing your teeth in a dream is one of the important visions that Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq were interested in interpreting. Through our site on dreams, we will learn about the opinions of interpreters on this topic. Interpretation of a dream about brushing teeth by Ibn Sirin. If the teeth are brushed incorrectly, the dreamer may be in danger, and this is a sign that he will make a mistake with something in his life. Therefore, he must take into account all the matters of his life and arrange his priorities. In the case of brushing the teeth by hand and not with a brush, this is a sign that he is working in a professional art, and he will master it and will earn a lot of money from it soon. If dental floss is used to get rid of food residue and cleanse the teeth, this is A sign that you will make a lot of money soon. If the teeth become loose while brushing, this is a sign that he has close people who want to harm him. See also: Teeth falling out in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about loose teeth. Seeing brushing teeth in a dream. New interpreters worked hard to interpret the dream of brushing teeth in A dream, but the interpretation of the vision varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Next, we will present the common interpretation for single people, married people, pregnant women, and divorced women. Brushing teeth in a dream for a single woman. If she sees her using a toothbrush, this is a sign of her ability to protect herself from all harm. In another opinion, it is evidence that she is a girl. Tahira is religiously committed and she follows a positive lifestyle to achieve her ambitions. Losing a brush in a dream is considered a sign of great neglect of God’s rights, whether in prayer or in her relationship with her parents, or perhaps her negligence in not wearing illegal clothes, or her shortcomings in her studies and lessons. If her brush was stolen and not Brushing her teeth is a sign of her failure and a waste of time. It is also a warning to her about the people who gather around her to harm her, so she should be careful and careful. If she buys dental floss, this is a sign of a new step that the dreamer will take. Perhaps it is an indication of a travel trip or a successful marriage. Or a new job. In the case of selling tools, this is a sign of her weak personality and vacillation in her opinions and decisions, which leads to failure. From another point of view, soon falling into crises and many troubles. If you find a toothbrush broken in two halves, or you find that it is dirty, this is a worthy dream. , a sign of fatigue, damage, evil and obstacles to come. If the brush is kept away from dust, this is a sign of preserving wealth and goodness. An exposed brush in a dream is a sign of evil. In case you receive a brush as a gift, this is a sign of God’s support for you to fulfill a wish. In case If the dreamer puts toothpaste on the brush and cleans the teeth until they become whiter, this is a sign that the dreamer is successful and has a great deal of self-confidence. Or she will be responsible for herself in all aspects of her life and have the ability to rely on herself. Read about that: Interpretation of a dream about falling Teeth: Interpretation of a dream about teeth

title: Interpretation of seeing an ugly girl in a dream: enemies and marriage

preview.html: An ugly girl or girl is one of the things that many people rebel against, especially when dreaming about her, and the last dream that the dreamer fears is the desire to know its interpretation as soon as possible. For this reason, we have dedicated this article to you to publish in detail the interpretation of a dream about an ugly woman and girl in a dream, as the most prominent dream interpretation scholars have stated that seeing an ugly girl in a dream indicates most of the time in life that the dreamer is actually living. Likewise, an ugly girl in a dream, especially if she appears to the dreamer in his dream with dirty and impure clothes or if her face is disfigured, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from a year full of exhaustion and problems in emotional, social or professional life, but in the event that the woman sees that (evil) is... The most correct view of dream interpreters is that it is a repulsive vision that does not at all require the monarch to interpret it, and God Almighty is superior and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of seeing a sister in a dream. Watch the interpretation of a dream about an ugly girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that an ugly girl in a dream is a sin, whether for a man or a woman. Running away from him or hiding from him also indicates fear and psychological anxiety about some problems that the dreamer may face. If an unmarried woman sees an unbeautiful girl and is afraid of her, this indicates the problems and crises that fall on her shoulders and the desire to seek help from others, while in a married woman’s dream this indicates Indicates loss of money. In something that is useless. If a man sees an ugly girl in a dream, the vision indicates that he will lose his position at work or become fascinated with life’s affairs and deviate from the path of truth. 4 important interpretations of the dream of an ugly woman on video. A dream of an ugly girl in a pregnant woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about a circle in A dream. Seeing an ugly girl in a dream with unpleasant features and a foul smell indicates the dreamer’s suffering in her life, saving her from calamities, and God will cast them upon her, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. The meaning of a dream about an ugly girl in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an ugly girl in one dream indicates negative feelings and psychological pressure. Dreamers also see that an ugly girl in the dream of a single woman who has never been married is a misery and extreme exhaustion that she is going through in life. If the unmarried woman sees her face in a different way, familiar or ugly in appearance, then the vision shows envy and the many enemies that surround her in her life. And the vision of the woman An ugly face in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of remorse for the sins and disobedience she has committed against God. Also, hitting an ugly woman’s vagina is a close occurrence and may reflect the imminent death of a person. Interpretation of seeing Abu Qardan in a dream. Meaning of seeing an ugly woman in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation Dream of magic in a dream. In a married woman’s dream, an ugly woman in appearance indicates some difficult problems between her and her husband. If a married woman sees an ugly girl in her dream and is afraid of her, this indicates financial crises, loss of money, and a desire to help. What is the interpretation of seeing an ugly girl in a dream? A dream about a woman? An ugly woman in a married dream
